DOC.brief_summary: This 2 arm study compare hemoglobin maintenance monthly Mircera administration versus epoetin beta darbepoetin alfa patient chronic kidney disease hemodialysis . Patients randomize receive either monthly s.c. i.v . Mircera ( start dose 120 200 microgram , calculate last weekly dose epoetin beta darbepoetin alfa previously administer ) , standard therapy ( iv sc epoetin beta , twice thrice weekly , iv sc darbepoetin alfa week twice week ) . The anticipated time study treatment 3-12 month , target sample size 500+ individual .
